model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Speaker B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: The portrait you ordered is coming along swimmingly! How are the little furries doing?
Speaker B: They are doing well. I think I am going to paint a portrait of my great dane standing next to my pet rat lol. Do you know where you want to get your new cat from?
Speaker A: Someone I work with at the dog daycare works at a shelter.  I think I will go there.
Speaker B: That's great. I have gotten my pets from the shelter and they seem happy I brought them home. I have a hard time saying no to them which is why I have so many pets. Cats are easier to take care of than dogs. Do you have a name in mind for your cat? 
Speaker A: I've thought of a lot of  names, but in the end it will probably depend on the breed and the sex.  
Speaker B: That's true. Is pilates hard? I've always wanted to try it but I don't know if it will be too difficult.
Speaker A: No, I don't think it's hard.  I actually enjoy it.  It's more fun than work, at least to me. You should give it a try!
Speaker B: Maybe I will. Do you think I can start at home by watching Youtube videos, or do I need to go to a Pilates class?
Speaker A: You can probably start with Youtube just to see if you like it.  Much better to go to a class I think though.  Of course, I'm biased. I'm in love with my instructor! haha
Speaker B: Lol, okay I will definitely try it at home first. If I can get the hang of it, I will sign up for a class. Hopefully I can get an instructor as good as yours lol! 
Speaker A: Well, getting some individual responses to questions and individual attention at times, I think makes a difference. But there is nothing wrong with going to youtube first!  I did!

[MEMORY]
Speaker B has 5 dogs of different breeds, has rats as pets, and thinks pit bulls are lovely.
Speaker B discovered love for portraits through a self-portrait with pets and prefers painting regular people over professionals.

raw_prediction: I'll give it a shot and see how it goes. Who knows, maybe I'll end up loving Pilates just like you!
prediction:
Brief explanation: Although the MEMORY does contain some relevant information about Speaker B's pets, this information isn't needed in the CONTEXT given as all the information necessary for Speaker B to respond has already been shared within the context itself. The conversation is now about pilates, and therefore information about pets and painting is no longer immediately relevant.
Judgement: "No"
